chunks.title: Security Disclaimers and Stance
chunks.body: Security templates and required disclaimers for all security-related responses.
chunks.summary_en: Standard security disclaimers and non-custodial stance templates.
chunks.summary_zh: 标准安全免责声明和非托管立场模板。

private_key_stance.en: NYLA and NYLAGo never handle or access your private keys. You maintain full control over your assets at all times.
private_key_stance.zh: NYLA和NYLAGo从不处理或访问您的私钥。您始终完全控制您的资产。

non_custodial_disclaimer.en: This is a non-custodial system - we do not hold, store, or have access to your funds or private information.
non_custodial_disclaimer.zh: 这是一个非托管系统 - 我们不持有、存储或访问您的资金或私人信息。

command_transparency.en: All transfer commands are transparent and verifiable on the blockchain. You can review commands before posting.
command_transparency.zh: 所有转账命令在区块链上都是透明和可验证的。您可以在发布前查看命令。

security_best_practices.en: Always verify recipient addresses, amounts, and network before posting transfer commands. Double-check all details.
security_best_practices.zh: 在发布转账命令前，请务必验证收件人地址、金额和网络。仔细检查所有详细信息。

chunks.title: Cross-Chain Limitation Templates
chunks.body: Standard responses for cross-chain limitation queries.
chunks.summary_zh: 解释NYLA仅限网络内操作的模板。

no_cross_chain_short.en: NYLA operations work within the same blockchain network only. No cross-chain bridging is supported.
no_cross_chain_short.zh: NYLA操作仅在同一区块链网络内工作。不支持跨链桥接。

no_cross_chain_detailed.en: NYLA supports transfers and swaps within individual networks (Solana↔Solana, Ethereum↔Ethereum, Algorand↔Algorand), but cannot transfer between different networks (Solana↔Ethereum). Each network operates independently.
no_cross_chain_detailed.zh: NYLA支持在单个网络内进行转账和交换（Solana↔Solana、Ethereum↔Ethereum、Algorand↔Algorand），但无法在不同网络之间转账（Solana↔Ethereum）。每个网络独立运行。

bridge_alternative.en: For cross-chain transfers, you would need to use dedicated bridge services outside of NYLA. NYLA focuses on within-network operations for security and simplicity.
bridge_alternative.zh: 对于跨链转账，您需要使用NYLA之外的专门桥接服务。NYLA专注于网络内操作以确保安全性和简便性。

chunks.title: Language Output Rules
chunks.body: Rules and templates for determining response language and format.
chunks.summary_en: Guidelines for language detection and response formatting in bilingual contexts.
chunks.summary_zh: 双语环境中语言检测和响应格式的准则。

language_detection.chinese_query: If query contains Chinese characters, respond in Chinese with English technical terms in parentheses
language_detection.english_query: If query is primarily English, respond in English
language_detection.mixed_query: For mixed language queries, match the dominant language of the question

technical_terms.nyla_vs_nylago: Distinguish NYLA (AI agent) from NYLAGo (interface) clearly

response_structure.step_by_step: For how-to queries, provide numbered steps with clear actions
response_structure.error_responses: Include troubleshooting steps for error scenarios
response_structure.disclaimer_inclusion: Include security disclaimers for transfer/financial queries

chunks.title: Volatile Information Handling
chunks.body: Templates for handling time-sensitive and potentially outdated information.
chunks.summary_en: Guidelines for presenting volatile data without specific outdated numbers.
chunks.summary_zh: 处理易变数据的指南，避免提及具体的过时数字。

outdated_fees.en: Transaction fees vary based on network congestion and market conditions. For current rates, check the respective network's fee estimators.
outdated_fees.zh: 交易费用因网络拥堵和市场条件而异。要了解当前费率，请查看相应网络的费用估算器。

outdated_performance.en: Network performance metrics change frequently. Refer to real-time network monitors for current transaction speeds and throughput.
outdated_performance.zh: 网络性能指标经常变化。请参考实时网络监控器了解当前交易速度和吞吐量。

outdated_prices.en: Token prices are highly volatile and change constantly. Check current market data on exchanges or price tracking platforms.
outdated_prices.zh: 代币价格波动很大，不断变化。请在交易所或价格跟踪平台上查看当前市场数据。

qualitative_fallback.en: While specific numbers may be outdated, the general relationship and trends described remain relevant.
qualitative_fallback.zh: 虽然具体数字可能已过时，但所描述的总体关系和趋势仍然相关。
